creditline: Lent by David and Flinnina Dewey
description: standing male figure wearing a robe with traces of red pigment (predominantly on trunk); hands clasped together below waist at front; hair parted in two buns on crown of head; L2005.58.2.1-5 and L2005.56.8.1-4 are the set of nine
title: Standing male figure, one of a set of nine
